name: Endless Escape (itch) (Niwaessence)
description:
Fight an endless wave of enemies with your magical furry companions!

Use the buttons above your team to use attacks. Attacks are randomized each game!

After each fight you can choose a relic to get in the top right.

Enemies scale infinitely, try to win as many fights as you can.

PS' still a little buggy, sorry.

https://liluo.io/niwaessence/endless-escape
